member.name: T:MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContextExtensions
member.summary:
Provides extension methods for the .
The "Execute..." methods with format strings and parameters are implemented here to make the compiler chooose the instance methods with parameters over these versions with string parameters.

member.name: M:MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContextExtensions.ExecuteQuery``1(MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContext,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes the given query and returns a sequence of results.
member.typeparam: The result type of the queried enumeration.
member.param: The this extension should work on.
The format string for the sql command to execute.
member.returns: An enumerator for the query results.

member.name: M:MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContextExtensions.ExecuteQuery(MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContext,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes the given query and return a sequence of dynamic instances.
member.param: The this extension should work on.
The format string for the sql command to execute.
member.returns: An enumerator for the query results. Those will be dynamic objects.

member.name: M:MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContextExtensions.ExecuteNonQuery(MoleSql.MoleSqlDataContext,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes the given query or command and returns the number of affected rows.
member.param: The this extension should work on.
The format string for the sql command to execute.
